name: NuGetToolInstaller
description: Finds or downloads and caches specified version spec of NuGet and adds it to the PATH.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version spec of version to get. If you want to match a pre-release version, the spec MUST contain a pre-release label and their major, minor, and patch versions MUST match. List of available versions obtained from [here](http://dist.nuget.org/tools.json). Examples: 4.x, 3.3.x, 2.8.6, >=4.0.0-0
